description:
$10 / Age 18 And Up / Music at 9PM

Four great Rochesterian acts unite in celebration as Vanishing Sun releases its second album live at Funk 'N Waffles.

Featuring sets by The English Project and Lost Wax with special performances by Eli Flynn throughout the night.

This one is not to be missed. RSVP and save the date!

Tickets:
http://www.ticketweb.com/event/vanishing-sun-lost-wax-the-funk-n-waffles-music-hall-tickets/7852385?REFERRAL_ID=twfb
name: Vanishing Sun ft. The English Project, Eli Flynn & Lost Wax
